alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 9:49PM EDT until September 07 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cheshire County in southern New Hampshire... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 948 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Chesterfield to 8 miles southwest of Winchester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Winchester, Richmond, Gilsum, Marlborough, Hinsdale, Roxbury, Fitzwilliam, Troy, Walpole, Sullivan, Alstead, Westmoreland, Swanzey, Chesterfield, Surry, Marlow, and Acworth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
